00029 class RealFunction: public RealBase {
00030     public:
00031         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00032                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00033                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00034                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00035                       parameterMap _parms = parameterMap());
00036         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00037 
00038         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00039                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00040                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00041         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00042         virtual void Draw (void);
00043 
00044         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00045                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00046                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00047 
00048     protected:
00049         VecMath::Vector<4> &normal(double t, double u, double v);
00050 
00051         void DrawPlane (unsigned);
00052         void DrawStrip (unsigned, unsigned);
00053         void DrawCube (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00054 
00055         virtual void Initialize (void);
00056         virtual void InitMem (void);
00057 
00058         vec4vec3D X,      
00059         Xtrans; 
00060         vec3vec3D Xscr;   
00061 
00062 };
00063 
00064 
00065 /*******************************************************************************
00066  *
00067  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00068  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00069  *  but need not
00070  */
00071 
00073 
00075 
00083 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00084     public:
00085         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00086                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00087                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00088                      double _rad = 1);
00089         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00090         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0,
00091                                     double = 0) { Radius = _a; }
00092 
00093     protected:
00094         virtual function_type f;
00095         virtual function_type normal;
00096 
00097         double Radius;
00098 };

00108 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00109     public:
00110         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00111                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00112                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00113                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00114         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00115         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00116                                     double _c = 0, double = 0) {
00117                                         R = _a; r = _b; rho = _c; }
00118 
00119     protected:
00120         virtual function_type f;
00121 
00122         double R, r, rho;
00123 };

00175 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00176     public:
00177         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00178                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00179                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00180                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00181         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00182         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00183             M = _a; R = _b;
00184         }
00185 
00186     protected:
00187         virtual function_type f;
00188 
00189         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00190         R;
00191 };
